Reviews.Title: Great GSM phone from Samsung
Reviews.Author: S.L. Sveik
Reviews.Content: Purchased this phone for my mother in Ukraine to replace the old Samsung phone. All she had to do was to insert her existing SIM card, and voila! The phone works great. My mom now learns to take pictures with it.

Reviews.Title: Excellent for Travel
Reviews.Author: Ginlo
Reviews.Content: If you travel overseas this is an excellent phone to have with you.  The Quad-Band is a fundamental feature, it allows you to traverse countries and time zones and works uninterrupted flawlessly.

Reviews.Title: Samsung C3053 GSM Unlocked phone
Reviews.Author: BlueOwl
Reviews.Content: A good basic camera phone.  Voice calling is clear.  Text messaging works.  The display is large.  The slider action is solid. The charger is an European one with a US adapter.

Reviews.Title: good
Reviews.Author: EddyBadinga-Vonga "melo"
Reviews.Content: good toolthis item met my expectation. I would recommend whoever to buy it for future need. No doubt, this what people should be looking for

Reviews.Title: an OK phone
Reviews.Author: eb
Reviews.Content: THE BATTERY PERFORMANCE ON THIS PHONE IS NOT ACCEPTABLE. Turning on the speaker phone  is not intuitive. It is not doable while you are making a call and the phone is in ringing. While on the phone it takes two button presses to turn it on or off.Other than that, it an OK phone but considering the price I paid for it, it was not a good buy.

Reviews.Title: No International phones should be sold in the U.S
Reviews.Author: Christopher_Ragland
Reviews.Content: the item you see here, is nothing like the ones you see in videos, especially the ones everyone goes to view on youtube. hardly any stations (on the radio), cannot send pictures (even if you've purchased multi-media packages), and last but not least, the camera quality sucks. not to many special features on this device, and the signal gets lost rather quick (i live in Michigan and my provider is at&t-; i should've had almost perfect signal)- oh and one lastthing, you need the (data package- internet usage) to play the games that came on the phone which has a little message saying "this is always free in the UK"long story short- the item sucks, horrible waste of money- and would've rather been better off buying crack. no jokes. international phones shouldn't be able to be sold in the U.S-
